pr_title: Support Petri Nets and Syntax Trees

timeline.message: Add PetriNet and SyntaxTree diagram types
Add PetriNet and SyntaxTree diagram type localization
Add PetriNet diagram type compass model
Add SyntaxTree diagram type compass model
Support PetriNet and SyntaxTree diagram types in compass UMLModelParser
Add tests for PetriNet diagram type compass model
Add tests for SyntaxTree diagram type compass model
Add PetriNet and SyntaxTree diagram models in the Artemis client
Add PetriNet and SyntaxTree diagram type to form selectors in the client
Move JSON from text blocks to .json files (see #2122)

timeline.bodyText: weird name for petri net arc
timeline.author: TobiasPr

timeline.bodyText: same here, shouldn't useCaseAssociation be something like syntacTreeLink?
timeline.author: TobiasPr

timeline.message: Fix local variable names in UMLModelParser

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: The JUnit 5 test method name 'similarityPetriNet_differentModels' doesn't match '[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*'
